name: Jumpgate Charade: An Orbital Blues Adventure
name_original: Jumpgate Charade: An Orbital Blues Adventure
description:
When a body gets dumped in space between Kentara Prospect and the jumpgate out of the system, it sets of a series of strange events for Ainsley Pritchard, a new friend of the Crew. There are murderers, money, and old war grudges coming to light in Jumpgate Charade.

---

A module for Orbital Blues inspired by the 1963 Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn film Charade.

This module is designed to fit into any game of Orbital Blues, and locations can be moved to other parts of your universe. This module also includes a new planet to serve as the backdrop of this setting. 

What about playing…? This can be used in other systems, but the stat blocks for Marks and some of the equipment are taken from the Orbital Blues core book.

---

Includes the following files:

  • Jumpgate Charade (pages and spreads layout)
  • Jumpgate Charade (plaintext version)
